item.title: Basement Show - Punk Night
item.description:
Venue Details

  • Location: Residential basement
  • Capacity: ~40 people
  • Challenges: Low ceilings (7ft), limited power outlets, noise restrictions

Setup

For this intimate punk show, I kept the setup minimal but effective:

  • 2x moving heads on floor stands (stage left/right)
  • 4x LED pars for stage wash
  • Simple controller with 8 pre-programmed scenes
  • Positioned fixtures to avoid audience sight lines

Results

The low ceilings actually worked in our favor, creating intense, focused beams during faster songs. Used deep reds and blues to match the punk aesthetic, with occasional strobing during breakdowns.

item.title: Living Room Show - Acoustic Night
item.description:
Venue Details

  • Location: Residential living room
  • Capacity: ~25 people
  • Challenges: Must maintain living room atmosphere, very limited space

Setup

Minimal setup focusing on ambiance over flash:

  • 4x LED pars positioned as uplights on walls
  • Warm white and amber color palette
  • Static lighting (no movement)
  • Battery-powered backup for one fixture

Results

Created a coffee-shop atmosphere that complemented the acoustic performances. Kept intensity low to maintain intimacy while ensuring performers were visible. Audience frequently commented on the “cozy” feeling.
